linkjvm.libkovan

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkjvm.libkovan.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to control the camera.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Markus Klein

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HIGH_RES 
      static int LOW_RES 
      static int MED_RES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(int res)
      Creates a new camera instance and opens the camera with the specified resolution and the standard configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getChannelCount()
      Returns the number of channels in the current configuration.
      int getCodeNum(int channel, int obj)
      Returns the data associated with the channel and the object.
      int getObjectArea(int channel, int obj)
      Returns the object�s bounding box area.
      int getObjectCount(int channel)
      Returns the number of objects that have been seen with the current configuration and the specified channel.
      int getObjectDataLenght(int channel, int obj)
      Returns the length of the QR code decoded string of the QR channel and the specified object.
      java.lang.String getOjectData(int channel, int obj)
      This method is used to get the decoded data as string from a QR code channel and the specified object.
      int loadConfig(java.lang.String name)
      Loads an other configuration file on the KIPR Link than the standard configuration.
      int update()
      Loads a new image from the camera for processing.

    • Method Detail

      • loadConfig

        public int loadConfig(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an other configuration file on the KIPR Link than the standard configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the configuration file (".config" must be appended!)
        Returns:
        1 on success and 0 on failure

      • update

        public int update()
        Loads a new image from the camera for processing.
        Returns:
        1 on success and 0 on failure

        Parameters:
        channel - channel
        obj - object
        Returns:
        bounding box area or -1 if the channel of the object does not exist
